oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-09-17 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 17, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Ferlin Husky, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Chet Atkins, Rod Brasfield, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rod Brasfield; Ferlin Husky; Grandpa Jones; Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ray Price) [continued from part 1] -- Ray Price introduces Ferlin Husky -- I'll Be Here For A Lifetime (Ferlin Husky) -- Ray Price introduces Grandpa Jones -- Fly Around My Pretty Little Miss (Grandpa Jones) -- Presentation of Cashbox Award for Most Promising Country Act to Ray Price and the Cherokee Cowboys (Grant Turner) -- Ray Price talks -- I Don't Want It On My Conscience (Ray Price) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ray Price) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Cherokee Cowboys (Musical group); Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Husky, Ferlin; Cash Box (Periodical)
